name: Pepper Jelly Chicken Fingers

ingredients.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning or Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning

preparation: Slice chicken breasts lengthwise into 4–5 pieces per breast.
In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together Red Pepper Jelly and mustard. Add remaining ingredients. Add chicken and toss to combine.
Place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner and bake for 10 minutes. Flip and continue cooking for an additional 10 minutes, or until thoroughly cooked.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with a dinner roll and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Red Pepper Jelly (new)
summary: A sweet red pepper flavor with a mild heat from cayenne.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: An all-purpose blend with mild heat & aromatic flavour.

products.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: The days of dry oven-roasted chicken that takes forever to make are over! There’s a better way, and it’s quick, juicy, and oh-so-tasty with Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning. In 20 minutes, you can cook a whole chicken in the microwave using the Round Steamer. With a flavour that outshines the store-bought kin —free of unnecessary additives and too much sodium—Rotisserie Chicken is so fast and easy it’s perfect for any night of the week!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
